scripts.test:login: cucumber-js features/sauceDemoLogin.feature --require features/step_definitions/*.js --require features/support/*.js --format progress-bar --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json && node config/reporter.js
scripts.test:checkout: cucumber-js features/sauceDemoCheckout.feature --require features/step_definitions/*.js --require features/support/*.js --format progress-bar --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json && node config/reporter.js
scripts.test:chrome: cross-env BROWSER=chromium cucumber-js --config config/cucumber.js && node config/reporter.js
scripts.test:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox cucumber-js --config config/cucumber.js && node config/reporter.js
scripts.test:safari: cross-env BROWSER=webkit cucumber-js --config config/cucumber.js && node config/reporter.js
scripts.test:edge: cross-env BROWSER=edge cucumber-js --config config/cucumber.js && node config/reporter.js
scripts.test:all-browsers: npm run test:chrome && npm run test:firefox && npm run test:safari && npm run test:edge

scripts.test:chrome-headless: cross-env BROWSER=chromium HEADLESS=true cucumber-js --config config/cucumber.js && node config/reporter.js
